statements: SELECT * FROM game_scores WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT game_name, score FROM game_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY date_played DESC
SELECT player_id, score, game_name FROM game_scores
SELECT game_name, date_played FROM game_scores WHERE player_id = 2 ORDER BY date_played ASC
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM game_scores GROUP BY player_id
SELECT player_id, score, game_name, date_played FROM game_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY date_played DESC;
SELECT game_name, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM game_scores GROUP BY game_name;
SELECT player_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM game_scores GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_name, date_played FROM game_scores WHERE date_played BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY player_id, date_played;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) AS unique_players, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM game_scores;
SELECT * FROM game_scores;
SELECT player_id, score FROM game_scores WHERE score > 100;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard ORDER BY ranking DESC;
SELECT player_id, ranking FROM leaderboard WHERE ranking <= 10;
SELECT player_id, score, ranking FROM game_scores INNER JOIN leaderboard ON game_scores.player_id = leaderboard.player_id;
SELECT * FROM game_scores ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM game_scores GROUP BY player_id HAVING MAX(score) > 100;
SELECT player_id, ranking FROM leaderboard WHERE ranking <= 10 ORDER BY ranking ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_scores JOIN leaderboard USING(player_id) WHERE ranking IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM game_scores GROUP BY player_id HAVING AVG(score) > 50;
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM game_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_id, ranking, wins, losses FROM leaderboard WHERE wins > 5 AND losses < 3 ORDER BY ranking ASC
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, completed_date FROM achievements WHERE achievement_id = 10 ORDER BY completed_date DESC
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM game_scores WHERE player_id = 3 ORDER BY game_id ASC
SELECT player_id, ranking, wins, losses FROM leaderboard WHERE ranking BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY wins DESC
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM game_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, ranking FROM leaderboard WHERE wins > 10 AND losses < 5 ORDER BY ranking ASC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, completed_date FROM achievements WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND completed_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, ranking, wins, losses FROM leaderboard WHERE wins + losses >= 20 ORDER BY wins DESC, losses ASC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM game_scores WHERE player_id > 100 AND game_id < 5 ORDER BY player_id ASC, game_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, score FROM GameScores JOIN Students ON GameScores.student_id = Students.student_id;
SELECT student_name, achievement_name FROM Achievements JOIN Students ON Achievements.student_id = Students.student_id ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM GameScores JOIN Students ON GameScores.student_id = Students.student_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT * FROM GameScores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT game_id, student_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM GameScores GROUP BY game_id, student_id;
SELECT * FROM Achievements WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM Leaderboard WHERE score > 200);
SELECT student_name, game_id, score FROM Students JOIN GameScores ON Students.student_id = GameScores.student_id WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT player_id, name FROM players;
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games;
SELECT player_id, rank, highest_score FROM leaderboard_rankings ORDER BY rank DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, unlock_date FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT game_name, MAX(score) AS max_score FROM game_scores GROUP BY game_name;
SELECT player_id, name, email FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT game_name, score, play_date FROM game_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY play_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, rank, highest_score FROM leaderboard_rankings ORDER BY rank ASC, highest_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, unlock_date FROM achievements WHERE unlock_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 3;
